okwu: Ihe ọ bụla na-ewe ohere ma nwee oke
mmewere: Ihe dị ọcha mere naanị otu ụdị atọm
at\u1ecdm: Nke kacha nta nke okwu nwere ike isonye na mmeghachi omume kemịkal
ngwak\u1ecdta: Ngwakọta abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa ihe anaghị ejikọta kemịkalụ
molekul: Otu nke atọm kemịkalụ jikọtara ọnụ
otu: Ngwakọta nwere otu ihe mejupụtara (dịka ọmụmaatụ, ngwọta)
iche iche: Ngwakọta na ihe ndị na-abụghị otu (dịka, nkwusioru)
steeti: Ụdị nke ihe dị ( siri ike, mmiri mmiri, gas, plasma)
siri ike: Ọnọdụ okwu nwere ọdịdị na olu doro anya
mmiri mmiri: Ọnọdụ okwu nwere olu doro anya mana enweghị ọdịdị doro anya
gas: Ọnọdụ okwu na-enweghị ọdịdị ma ọ bụ olu doro anya
mmeghachi omume: Usoro ebe bekee na-agbanwe na-etolite ọhụrụ bekee
na-emeghachi omume: Ihe na-agbanwe na mmeghachi omume kemịkal
ngwaah\u1ecba: Ihe ọhụrụ etolite na mmeghachi omume kemịkal
njik\u1ecd: Kwado ijikọ atọm ọnụ n'ime molekul ma ọ bụ ogige
usoro \u1ecdgw\u1ee5: Ụzọ mkpirisi iji nọchite anya ihe n'iji akara na ọnụọgụgụ
nhazi kem\u1ecbkal\u1ee5: Ihe nnọchianya nke mmeghachi omume kemịkal
ngw\u1ecdta: Ngwakọta dị n'otu nke solute (ihe gbazere) na ihe mgbaze (ihe mgbaze)
itinye uche: Ọnụ ego nke solute agbazere n'ime ihe mgbaze nyere
acid: Ihe na-enye ion hydrogen (H+) n'ime mmiri
isi: Ihe na-anabata ion hydrogen (H+) n'ime mmiri
neutralization: Mmeghachi omume n'etiti acid na isi, na-eme nnu na mmiri
ike kem\u1ecbkal\u1ee5: Ike enwere ike ịchekwa na njikọ kemịkalụ nke ihe
